title: Lemon drizzle loaf
ingredients: ['For the loaf', '155g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '155g golden caster sugar', '20g cornflour', '155g unsalted butter', '3 large eggs', '3 unwaxed lemons, zested', '3 and 1/2 tbsp lemon juice', 'For the drizzle', '160g caster sugar', '5 tablespoons lemon juice']
